argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clm0.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | clmsub.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_clmsca | |- ( W e. CMod -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( W e. CMod -> ( norm ` F ) = ( norm ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K ) -> ( norm ` F ) = ( norm ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K ) -> ( ( norm ` F ) ` A ) = ( ( norm ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ` A ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2 | #P_clmsubrg | |- ( W e. CMod -> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_subrgsubg | |- ( K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> K e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. CMod -> K e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( CCfld |`s K ) = ( CCfld |`s K ) |
| 11 |  | #P_cnfldnm | |- abs = ( norm ` CCfld ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( norm ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) = ( norm ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 11, 12 | #P_subgnm2 | |- ( ( K e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) /\ A e. K ) -> ( ( norm ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ` A ) = ( abs ` A ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K ) -> ( ( norm ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ` A ) = ( abs ` A ) ) |
| 15 | 6, 14 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K ) -> ( abs ` A ) = ( ( norm ` F ) ` A ) ) |
